backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a testimonial storage system with functions to add, retrieve by ID, and list all testimonials containing client name, company, feedback, and profile image URL.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three completed features: removal of TestimonialsSection and PricingSection components, and creation of EliteClientProfilesSection and AIPerformanceSection components with detailed specifications.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend component files describing their functionality, styling, animations, and visual effects for the SwiftOps Automation website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and component styling using HSL color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SwiftOps Automation application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component orchestrating the complete page layout with Navbar, Hero, Services, Stats, HowItWorks, Integrations, EliteClientProfiles, AIPerformance, FinalCTA, Contact, Footer sections, and NeonCursor effect.
frontend/src/components/AIPerformanceSec: Section displaying AI-driven performance metrics with animated counters for automation rate, processing speed, accuracy, and manual intervention reduction, plus a testimonial quote and connected workflow visualization with animated nodes.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section displaying glassmorphism cards with contact information (name, phone, WhatsApp, Instagram, email) featuring icon-based layout, special green glow for WhatsApp, and scroll-triggered fade-in animations.
frontend/src/components/EagleClickAnimat: Renders a full-screen eagle logo animation with multiple stages (fade, draw, expand, particles, pulse, scale, fadeout) triggered by an isActive prop and calls onComplete when finished.
frontend/src/components/EagleLogo.tsx: Displays the SwiftOps eagle logo with neon glow effects, hover animations, and a pulsing radial background; supports icon/full variants and custom sizing.
frontend/src/components/EliteClientProfi: Renders a grid of three client testimonial cards with profile images, names, positions, and quotes; uses intersection observer for fade-in animations.
Displays a final call-to-action section with a headline, email input form, and submit button with ripple effect for lead capture.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a comprehensive footer with brand info, link columns (Company, Services, Resources, Legal), social media icons, contact details, and copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Main hero section with parallax neural grid background, animated eagle logo, floating particles, headline text, and CTA buttons that trigger eagle click animation before scrolling to target sections.
frontend/src/components/HowItWorksSectio: Displays a three-step process (Connect, Deploy, Automate) with icons and descriptions in glass cards, connected by an animated energy pulse line on desktop.
frontend/src/components/IntegrationsSect: Displays a horizontally scrolling list of integration partners (Slack, Google Workspace, etc.) with animated glass cards and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with logo, section links, and active section highlighting; triggers eagle animation on navigation clicks and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/NeonCursor.tsx: Custom cursor component that displays a neon blue radial gradient glow effect following the mouse on desktop devices only.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Empty file placeholder for pricing section component.
Grid layout displaying six service cards (AI Agents, Chatbots, Email Automation, etc.) with icons, descriptions, and staggered fade-in animations.
frontend/src/components/StatsSection.tsx: Displays four animated statistics (tasks automated, integrations, uptime, clients) with counter animations triggered on scroll into view.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Empty file placeholder for testimonials section component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to track which section is currently visible in the viewport for navigation highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with authentication, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCounterAnimation.t: Custom hook that animates a number from 0 to a target value over a specified duration using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionObserv: Custom hook that returns a boolean indicating whether a referenced element is intersecting the viewport based on threshold and margin options.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Custom hook that calculates and returns a parallax scroll offset based on window scroll position and a speed multiplier.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for React Query hooks that would interact with the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useRippleEffect.ts: Custom hook that creates a Material Design-style ripple effect animation at the click position on any element.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file importing Google Fonts (Orbitron, Inter), Tailwind directives, and defining custom CSS variables, utilities for neon/cyan color scheme, glassmorphism effects, animated buttons with glow effects, and futuristic dark theme styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that renders the App component wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palette (neon-cyan, dark-bg, electric-blue), font families (Orbitron, Inter), border radius variables, accordion animations, and enabling tailwindcss-animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document describing a futuristic dark/neon landing page with glassmorphism, animated counters, responsive layouts, and listing completed features including removal of testimonials/pricing sections and addition of elite client profiles and AI performance sections with specific image requirements.
